title: Electric Guitar
description: A versatile instrument used in various genres of music, known for its amplified sound and wide range of tones.

title: Grand Piano
description: A large acoustic piano with horizontal strings and a frame supported by three legs.

title: Saxophone
description: A woodwind instrument usually made of brass, known for its distinctive shape and sound.

title: Drum Set
description: A collection of drums and other percussion instruments, played by striking with drumsticks or hands.

title: Violin
description: A string instrument played with a bow, known for its rich sound and versatility.
